hero.fullIntro: I'm a product designer and creative technologist passionate about building beautiful, functional digital experiences. With 8+ years in the industry, I help startups and enterprises transform complex problems into elegant solutions.

services.title: Product Strategy
services.description: End-to-end product planning, user research, and strategic roadmapping to align business goals with user needs.

services.title: UX/UI Design
services.description: Beautiful, intuitive interfaces backed by solid user research and design systems thinking.

services.title: Prototyping
services.description: Interactive prototypes and design systems that bridge the gap between design and development.

services.title: Design Mentorship
services.description: 1-on-1 coaching for designers and PMs looking to level up their skills and advance their careers.

about.story: Originally from San Francisco, I started my journey in tech as a frontend developer before transitioning into product design. I'm passionate about the intersection of technology and human behavior, and I believe great design should be invisible ‚Äì it just works.
